title: Aladdin and the Wonderful Lamp
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 2,084 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 810L
description: A magician tricks Aladdin, the son of a poor tailor, into getting a magic lamp from a hidden cavern. Aladdin is able to use the magic lamp to get treasures for his family and marry the Sultan's daughter, Princess Buddir. But the magician wants his lamp back, and Aladdin must outwit him again.
highFrequencyWords: delectable, flattered, incense, labor, obey, peddler, procession, shutter, sorcery, summoned, sumptuous, trade
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Common Suffixes : Identify words with suffixes -ful and -ness
